definition: (dialect) to rub one's hand along/to fire (an employee)/to reprimand
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
(slang) to masturbate
(coll.) to pump iron/to work out

sentences.english: How can you lose a man in 5 mins?
sentences.chinese: 如何在5分钟内撸死一个男人？

sentences.english: Trust me, he's Mormon, those guys never wank.
sentences.chinese: 相信我，他是个摩门教徒，他们不会撸的。

sentences.english: Each blow, you'll find out that life is so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 互撸一下，你会发现生活竟然是如此的美好。

sentences.english: Tilly drew her own leg up onto the chair and pulled up her pants leg.
sentences.chinese: 蒂莉把她自己的腿伸到椅子上，撸起裤腿。

sentences.english: Never blow your nose, burp, belch at and around the table.
sentences.chinese: 绝对不要在餐桌上或在餐桌旁撸鼻子或打饱嗝。

sentences.english: Its wretched kingdoms quake beneath my rage.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的王国在我的狂撸中崩溃。

sentences.english: MeiRi abides by a ZERO TOLERANCE policy relating to any illegal content.
sentences.chinese: 撸一夜视频恪守与任何非法内容采取零容忍政策。

definition: (slang) to masturbate
to throw off inhibitions/to go all out
to scratch one's foot/(fig.) to be stingy/(slang) (of a celebrity) to twiddle one's thumbs (i.e. not release any new material etc)
trouble/disturbance/rumpus/flirty/coquettish/abbr. for 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1]/literary writings/smell of urine/foul smell/male (animal) (dialect)
(vulgar) to rattle on/to talk drivel
(coll.) an old hand at sth
to crack (seeds) between one's teeth
to weed/to grip or clutch
to peel/to skin/to tear/to pull down/to cling to (sth on which one is climbing)/to dig
to rake up/to steal/to braise/to crawl
(slang) very close same-sex friend/gay partner
to chop up (meat etc)/to chop off (sb's hand etc)
to tie in to
penis/(slang) cool or extraordinary/(Cantonese) to fuck
oh alas/hey!/hi! (loanword)/a high (natural or drug-induced) (loanword)
(Internet slang) friend (pun on 朋友[peng2 you3])
to tease/to provoke/to stir up (emotions)
to lift up (sth hanging down)/to raise (hem of skirt)/to pull up (sleeve)/to sprinkle (water with cupped hands)
